Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Amberton Lane, just west of the Temple of Ilsensine.
Room.LongDescription: Ilsensine is the mental and spiritual diety of the illithids. The illithids are a race of ultra-powerful mental and magical masters who have been known to wipe out parties without ever actually touching their opponents. Ilsensine is one of the most feared and most powerful dieties a non-illithid can encounter.
